title: Terra
description: In the shadow of a devastating plague that has decimated Earth’s population, humanity is divided.Above, the elite live in opulent skycities, while those who remain on the ground—terrestrials—struggle to survive in settlements scattered across the dying planet. Eighteen-year-old Terra Rhodon ekes out a living as a scav, scouring the earth for scraps to recycle for profit... until a routine scavenging run leads to a discovery that shocks her home settlement of Genesis X-16.Suddenly, Terra finds herself with questions no one will answer and, unbeknownst to her, a target on her back. Her search for the truth ultimately leads her to Adam—an enigmatic skydweller with a secret that could change humanity forever.
author: Gretchen Fox
